parts.text:
```json
{
  "application": "Amber",
  "software_requirements": [
    "CUDA 10.2",
    "GNU Compiler",
    "MPI (disabled in script)",
    "Miniconda (downloaded during build)"
  ],
  "resource_requirements": {
    "nodes": 1,
    "cpus": 8,
    "gpus": 1,
    "walltime": "24:00:00"
  },
  "build_steps": [
    "Download source files",
    "Extract source files",
    "Apply patch for CMake",
    "Run CMake with specified options",
    "Build with make",
    "Install",
    "Save build logs"
  ],
  "modulefile_creation": {
    "template": "template_modulefile",
    "path": "$PREFIX_APP_DIR/modules/$software_kind/$name/$version"
  },
  "permissions": {
    "directories": "755",
    "files": "644"
  }
}
```
